PLAY.TITLE: The Second Part of Henry the Fourth

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.PERSONA: PRINCE HENRY OF WALES afterwards KING HENRY V.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: Lord Chief-Justice of the King's Bench
MISTRESS QUICKLY, hostess of a tavern in Eastcheap.
A Dancer, speaker of the epilogue.

INDUCT.TITLE: INDUCTION
INDUCT.STAGEDIR: Enter RUMOUR, painted full of tongues

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. London. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter FALSTAFF, with his Page bearing his sword
and buckler
Enter the Lord Chief-Justice and Servant

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. York. The Archbishop's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK, the Lords HASTINGS,
MOWBRAY, and BARDOLPH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, FANG and his Boy with her,
and SNARE following.
Enter the Lord Chief-Justice, and his men
Exeunt MISTRESS QUICKLY, BARDOLPH, Officers and Boy

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Warkworth. Before the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter NORTHUMBERLAND, LADY NORTHUMBERLAND, and LADY PERCY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. London. The Boar's-head Tavern in Eastcheap.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY and DOLL TEARSHEET
Enter, behind, PRINCE HENRY and POINS, disguised
Exeunt PRINCE HENRY, POINS, PETO and BARDOLPH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Westminster. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING HENRY IV in his nightgown, with a Page

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Gloucestershire. Before SHALLOW'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SHALLOW and SILENCE, meeting; MOULDY,
SHADOW, WART, FEEBLE, BULLCALF, a Servant or two
with them
Enter BARDOLPH and one with him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Yorkshire. Gaultree Forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK, MOWBRAY, LORD
HASTINGS, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another part of the forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, from one side, MOWBRAY, attended; afterwards
the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK, HASTINGS, and others: from
the other side, Prince John of LANCASTER, and
WESTMORELAND; Officers, and others with them

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Another part of the forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum. Excursions. Enter FALSTAFF and COLEVILE, meeting

Enter PRINCE JOHN OF LANCASTER, WESTMORELAND,
BLUNT, and others

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LANCASTER
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt BLUNT and others with COLEVILE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Westminster. The Jerusalem Chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY IV, the Princes Thomas of CLARENCE
and Humphrey of GLOUCESTER, WARWICK, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
KING HENRY IV lying on a bed: CLARENCE,
GLOUCESTER, WARWICK, and others in attendance
Re-enter WARWICK, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, and the rest

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Gloucestershire. SHALLOW'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SHALLOW, FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, and Page

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Westminster. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter WARWICK and the Lord Chief-Justice, meeting

Enter LANCASTER, CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER,
WESTMORELAND, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Gloucestershire. SHALLOW'S orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW, SILENCE, DAVY, BARDOLPH,
and the Page
To SILENCE, seeing him take off a bumper

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. London. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter Beadles, dragging in HOSTESS QUICKLY
and DOLL TEARSHEET

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A public place near Westminster Abbey.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter FALSTAFF, SHALLOW, PISTOL,
BARDOLPH, and Page
Shouts within, and the trumpets sound

Enter KING HENRY V and his train, the Lord Chief-
Justice among them

Re-enter Prince John of LANCASTER, the Lord
Chief-Justice; Officers with them

Exeunt all but PRINCE JOHN and the Lord
Chief-Justice
